channel.title: How do you make a moving sprite?[Renamed]
channel.description:
I want do add a sprite that drops down from the top of the screen and fades away. [NO, not the new xp crap] It's going to be a custom made sprite (by me) and what I put on it will be a simple line of text.
Anyone know how to go about doing this?

item.title: How do you make a moving sprite?[Renamed]
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

[QUOTE=Cronicman1;2329058]Most people already seen my project : Runescape to Scelestus and are wondering how I make my chatbox move.

REFACTORED but easily could be used for NON REFACTORED

So here it is:

People wanted a picture… Heres a video :P(JUST LOOK AT THE CHATBOX, its a sprite. You can move anything. The text is moving exactly like this aswell)

http://img185.imageshack.us/i/broswercam0017.mp4/

Note:
This will only work on anything that will be drawn constantly such as:
Login Screen
GameFrame
ChatArea

Okay first make a variable:
(you would have to make different ones for different sprites)

	public int moving = 0;

(You dont have to but it will work for you guys)
now make a new method

	public void movingSprite() {
		moving += 6;
		if(moving > 100) {
			moving = 100;
		}
		_____.drawsprite.(x-moving,y)
	}

Change the speed: by changing the adding variable Change this code:

		moving += 6;

Give the sprite a limit… So it doesnt move forever. Change this code:

		if(moving > 100) {
			moving = 100;
		}

The blank is the sprite you want to move…

Moving horizontal would be:

_____.drawsprite.(x-moving,y)

moving vertical would be:

_____.drawsprite.(x,y-moving)

Oh and last of all put this where it gets drawn 24/7
In this method : method146
where it says draw3dScreen();
put this under it:

		movingSprite();

I hope this helps l0l[/QUOTE]

Heres a start, tutorial made by Cronicman1 off R-S.
